articles.title: Discovering Uranus' Glow: New Hints for Life on Icy Exoplanets - SciTechDaily
articles.description: University of Leicester astronomers confirm the existence of an infrared (IR) aurora on Uranus. The presence of an infrared aurora on the cold, outer planet of Uranus has been confirmed for the first time by University of Leicester astronomers. The discovery …
articles.content:
ByUniversity of LeicesterOctober 29, 2023
An artistic representation of how the northern infrared aurora would have looked in 2006 (marked in red). The darker red locations indicate confirmed aurora… [+7707 chars]

articles.title: Israeli forces 'gradually expand' ground operations in Gaza for second day - Financial Times
articles.description: Netanyahu speaks of ‘long and hard’ war as UN warns of civil disorder in besieged enclave
articles.content:
Israel has pressed on with its ground offensive in Gaza for a second night as prime minister Benjamin Netanyahu said the country had launched a new phase of its long and hard war to destroy Hamas.
